description.@en: By crushing the shell in-hand, you are able to grant a minor gift of protection to another.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch increases their Peril Threshold by 3.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and they immediately move one step up the Peril Condition Track positively.

criticalFailure.@en: With but a touch, the strength withers away from the intended beneficiary of this Magick. They suffer a -3 to Peril Threshold for the spellâ€™s Duration.

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
